name: Following the Flock
description:
This is a game submission for the WolverineSoft 2022 Shamrock game jam.

Help the baby bird avoid obstacles by following the directions of the mama bird. Play in boss baby mode to play as a legally distinct "baby-in-upper-management"!

Credits:

Programming: Alexander Wang, Jacob Robinson, Lucas Marra, Allie Lavacek

Graphics/Music: Allie Lavacek

Goose Noises: US Government

Other Sounds: freesound.org
